title: THOUGHT / APOCALYPSE COP
description:
Shivers is all about being an Apocalypse Cop.

Thou art the harbinger of doom, embrace thine destiny.

dialogueTree.title: Half Light: "Tremble. THE TIME IS NOW. τὰ ὅλα."
dialogueTree.english: Tremble. THE TIME IS NOW. τὰ ὅλα.

links.title: Half Light: "Time for THE SHOW. For τὰ ὅλα. The..."
links.english: Time for THE SHOW. For τὰ ὅλα. The hallowed time of fear and disintegration. A countdown has begun. All will collapse on itself. The world will disappear into a single grain of blackness. All sound will be muted. All life will scream.
links.polish: Czas na POKAZ. Na τὰ ὅλα. Święty czas strachu i rozpadu. Oto zaczęło się odliczanie. Wszystko się zawali. Wszystko rozsypie się w proch. Świat obróci się w pojedyncze ziarenko mroku. Wszelkie dźwięki ucichną. Wszelkie życie zakrzyknie.
links.belarusian: Час на ПАКАЗ. На τὰ ὅλα. Святы час страху і распаду. Вось пачалося адлічэнне. Усё абрынецца. Усё рассыплецца ў пыл. Свет ператворыцца ў адно зерне цемры. Усе гукі зціхнуць. Усё жыццё закрычыць.

links.title: Half Light: "οῦ λόγου δ' ἐόντος ξυνοῦ ζώουσιν οἱ..."
links.english: οῦ λόγου δ' ἐόντος ξυνοῦ ζώουσιν οἱ πολλοὶ ὡς ἰδίαν ἔχοντες φρόνησιν.
links.polish: οῦ λόγου δ' ἐόντος ξυνοῦ ζώουσιν οἱ πολλοὶ ὡς ἰδίαν ἔχοντες φρόνησιν.
links.belarusian: οῦ λόγου δ' ἐόντος ξυνοῦ ζώουσιν οἱ πολλοὶ ὡς ἰδίαν ἔχοντες φρόνησιν.

links.title: You: "Wait, wait -- when did this *countd..."
links.english: Wait, wait -- when did this *countdown* begin?
links.polish: Zaraz, zaraz. Kiedy to *odliczanie* się niby zaczęło?
links.belarusian: Пачакай, пачакай. Калі гэта *адлік* нібыта пачаўся?

links.title: Half Light: "Monday morning. The moment you arri..."
links.english: Monday morning. The moment you arrived in this reality. You are the first crack in the sheer face of god. From you it will spread.
links.polish: W poniedziałek rano. W chwili, kiedy przybyłeś do tej rzeczywistości. Jesteś pierwszym pęknięciem na niewzruszonej dotąd twarzy boga. I będziesz się rozprzestrzeniał.
links.belarusian: У панядзелак раніцай. У той момант, калі ты прыбыў у гэтую рэчаіснасць. Ты першая расколіна на нязменным дагэтуль твары бога. І ты будзеш распаўсюджвацца.

links.title: You: "This is because of the insane world..."
links.english: This is because of the insane world-ending I've been saying isn't it? (Proceed.)
links.polish: To przez to moje godne szaleńca głoszenie końca świata, prawda? (Przejdź dalej).
links.belarusian: Гэта з-за майго вар'яцкага галашэння пра канец свету, праўда? (Ідзі далей).

links.title: Half Light: "Yes. You spoke the words of the παλ..."
links.english: Yes. You spoke the words of the παλίντροπος, and the houses of Perikarnassis. Items, people, even WORDS will tumble, all will lose its meaning in the coming years. That is why you marked yourself.
links.polish: Tak. Wygłosiłeś słowa παλίντροπος i rodów Perykarnasu. Przedmioty, ludzie... nawet SŁOWA zadrżą i przez kolejne lata utracą swoje znaczenie. Dlatego właśnie oznaczyłeś sam siebie.
links.belarusian: Так. Ты прамовіў словы παλίντροπος і родаў Перыкарнаса. Прадметы, людзі... нават СЛОВЫ затрасуцца і на наступныя гады страцяць сваё значэнне. Вось чаму ты пазначыў сам сябе.

links.title: You: "Am I sure it's not just a joke, or..."
links.english: Am I sure it's not just a joke, or some kind of coping mechanism?
links.polish: Mogę mieć pewność, że to nie żart albo jakiś mechanizm obronny?
links.belarusian: Ці магу я быць упэўнены, што гэта не жарт або нейкі механізм абароны?

links.title: Half Light: "It's *totally* also a coping mechan..."
Half Light: "So you should be. The world island..."
links.english: So you should be. The world island crumbles at your feet and in the far plain -- παλίντροπος.
links.polish: I słusznie. Wyspa świata rozpada się pod twoimi stopami, w oddali zaś... παλίντροπος.
links.belarusian: І справядліва. Востраў свету распадаецца пад вашымі нагамі, далей жа... παλίντροπος.

links.title: Volition: "Perhaps -- just a thought -- this h..."
links.english: Perhaps -- just a thought -- this has something to do with the hangover?
links.polish: A może – tak tylko sobie rozmyślam – to wszystko trochę przez kaca?
links.belarusian: А магчыма – вось так проста разважаю – гэта ўсё трохі з-за пахмелля?

links.title: You: "I *do* think the world might end so..."
links.english: I *do* think the world might end soon. (Opt in.)
links.polish: *Faktycznie* mam wrażenie, że świat może się niedługo skończyć. (Wejdź w to).
links.belarusian: *Фактычна*, у мяне ўражанне, што свет можа неўзабаве скончыцца. (Уваходзь у гэта).

links.title: Half Light: "The face of the woman fractures. Th..."
links.english: The face of the woman fractures. There will be herd killing. We all become vapour.
links.polish: Twarz kobiety rozpada się. Stado zostanie wysłane na rzeź. Wszyscy obrócimy się w pył.
links.belarusian: Твар жанчыны распадаецца. Статак будзе адпраўлены на забой. Мы ўсе ператворымся ў пыл.

links.title: You: "Uhm... yeah, I'm going to opt out o..."
links.english: Uhm... yeah, I'm going to opt out of the 'παλίντροπος' whatever it is. This was a mistake. (Opt out.)
links.polish: Yyy. Tak, myślę, że czymkolwiek jest παλίντροπος, nie jest raczej dla mnie. To był błąd. (Nie wchodź w to).
links.belarusian: Гм. Так, я думаю, што чым бы ні быў παλίντροπος, гэта, мабыць, не для мяне. Гэта была памылка. (Не ўвайдзі ў гэта).

links.title: Half Light: "Okay, yes. Maybe it *is* just the h..."
links.english: Okay, yes. Maybe it *is* just the hangover talking. Or some kind of joke you're playing on yourself instead of working on the case...
links.polish: Dobrze, tak. Może to *faktycznie* myśli zrodzone z kaca. Albo jakiś żart, który urządzasz sam sobie, żeby odwrócić swoją uwagę od sprawy...
links.belarusian: Добра, так. Магчыма, гэта *насамрэч* думкі, якія з'явіліся з пахмелля. Ці нейкі жарт, які ты ладзіш сам сабе, каб адцягнуць сваю ўвагу ад справы...

links.title: You: "Yeah... I don't think the time is *..."
links.english: Yeah... I don't think the time is *now*. Later maybe. [Leave.]
links.polish: Tak... To chyba jeszcze *nie ten czas*. Może później. [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: Так... Гэта напэўна яшчэ *не той час*. Можа пазней. [Адысці].

links.title: Half Light: "No. You cannot *leave*. The countdo..."
links.english: No. You cannot *leave*. The countdown has not yet reached XERO.
links.polish: Nie. Nie możesz *odejść*. Na liczniku nie pokazało się jeszcze XERO.
links.belarusian: Не. Ты не можаш *сысці*. На лічыльніку яшчэ не паказаўся XERO.
